Careers

Collaboration
Diversity
Recognition
Talent
Excellence

Your career growth at PCC Aero is directly linked to your ability to drive the company to new levels of performance, so we reward success and encourage employees to use their education and experience to take the company and their careers to new heights.

We offer a wide range of benefits, including market-leading health and retirement plans, generous tuition assistance, paid time off, and programs that support you and your family as well as your community. We foster a diverse, collaborative and inclusive environment that empowers you to do your best. Equal pay for equal work is a foundational element of our approach. We take action through ongoing pay reviews to ensure you’re compensated equitably throughout your career—independent of race, gender or ethnicity. It’s the right thing to do and makes us a better, more inclusive and higher-performing company.

There’s real power in listening to every voice. That’s why we value diversity and inclusion at every level of our company. Our welcoming, respectful and engaging environment is ideal for fostering innovation and for developing careers. We have a formal diversity strategy that drives everything we do.

When you join PCC Aero, you’re giving your career a giant head start. From working on real projects on day one to collaborating with amazing people on amazing projects, we can offer you exceptional internships, rotational programs and early career opportunities. Start building your future right now. Annual incentives are one cornerstone of our pay-for-performance culture. Generally, the better the company does, the better the incentive award opportunities. For most salaried nonunion employees, individual performance is also a factor in determining annual incentive payouts. The company's approach to employee performance reviews and incentives includes consideration of the employee's commitment to our Enduring Values and Boeing Behaviors.
